channel.title: How to connect Rotary encoder to Axoloti?
channel.description:
Hi there,
I'm trying to connect a rotary encoder to my Axoloti, but I don't find the solution. I have a 3 pins rotary like that : https://www.amazon.fr/gp/product/B018S9GUKI/ref=oh_aui_detailpage_o03_s00?ie=UTF8&psc=1 With Arduino I connect left to +, right to -, middle to Analog In and it works. I tried to do the same with Axoloti and it doesn't work. Is someone can help me ??
Thanks for all

item.title: How to connect Rotary encoder to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @FloSan
item.description:
@FloSan wrote:

Hi JeromeB,

Thanx for you answer. It works well. I tried with PA and not with PB.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect Rotary encoder to Axoloti?

item.title: How to connect Rotary encoder to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @JeromeB
item.description:
@JeromeB wrote:

Hi @FloSan,

You try to connect Potentiometer or rotary encoders ? In your link it's potentiometer.
Follow this link : http://community.axoloti.com/t/official-pin-out-ports-documentation/202/11
and this : http://community.axoloti.com/t/official-pin-out-ports-documentation/202/5

For example, connect GND and VDDA on the 2 extrem pins and GPIOB1 on pin in the middle.
Then use gpio/in/analog object with PB1 for parameter :

Hope this helps you.

Read full topic
item.source: How to connect Rotary encoder to Axoloti?

item.title: How to connect Rotary encoder to Axoloti?
item.dc:creator: @FloSan
item.description:
@FloSan wrote:

Hi there,

I'm trying to connect a rotary encoder to my Axoloti, but I don't find the solution.
I have a 3 pins rotary like that :

amazon.fr

5x potentiometre B10K 10K ohm Simple lineaire Conique rotatif: Amazon.fr: High-tech

*Caractéristiques: * 10K ohms, 3 Bornes, simple linéaire (de type B), convient à la plupart * Boutons standard. * Haut Type d'ajustement et de l'arbre moleté pour faciliter fonctionner en temps de l'u ...


With Arduino I connect left to +, right to -, middle to Analog In and it works.
I tried to do the same with Axoloti and it doesn't work.
Is someone can help me ??

Thanks for all
